title: [Large-Scale] Survey-Based Competency Assessment Program for Entrepreneurship Development

context.additional_context: Competency assessment and feedback provision using smartphone-based survey tools

learning_goals: Learners can evaluate the five core competencies required for entrepreneurship (self-management, problem-solving, leadership, creativity, communication).
Learners can identify their strengths and areas needing improvement based on survey results.
Learners can establish individualized competency development plans using analysis results.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
